synonyms.synonym: Calmodulin-dependent calcineurin A subunit gamma isoform

protein.specific_function: Calcium-dependent, calmodulin-stimulated protein phosphatase. This subunit may have a role in the calmodulin activation of calcineurin.

reference.reference_text: Muramatsu T, Kincaid RL: Molecular cloning and chromosomal mapping of the human gene for the testis-specific catalytic subunit of calmodulin-dependent protein phosphatase (calcineurin A). Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1992 Oct 15;188(1):265-71.
